text: Yashima may refer to: == Places == * Yashima, Akita * Yashima, Kagawa, a place in Takamatsu, Kagawa * Yashima, a former name of Takamatsu, Kagawa == Other uses == * Battle of Yashima * Japanese battleship Yashima * Operation Yashima * Yashima-ji, a Shingon temple in Yashima, Kagawa * Yashima (surname) * Yashima Station (disambiguation)
title: Yashima
